title: AI-driven Task Prioritizer
description: Design and implement a plugin that uses runtime metrics (completion times, agent load, priorities) to dynamically reprioritize and reorder tasks in the global task board for optimal throughput.
benefits: Improved agent utilization and reduced idle time
Adaptive to changing workloads and dependencies
tasks: Collect and analyze task execution metrics
Develop scoring algorithm for dynamic prioritization
Integrate with shared_mailboxes to update task statuses
Ensure conflict resolution for competing priorities
